alert.note: Alert for Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 11:10PM EDT until April 16 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lanier County in south central Georgia... Central Lowndes County in south central Georgia... * Until midnight EDT. * At 1110 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near I-75 At Exit 16, or near Valdosta, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Valdosta, Lake Park, Moody Air Force Base, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Naylor, Greenwood, Barretts, Hansell, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 11, Stockton and Teeterville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
